item.title: Corrected the misunderstanding about the class Symbol in Shoes.
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
See the following IRB outputs.
C:\>ruby -vruby 1.8.6 (2007-09-24 patchlevel 111) [i386-mswin32]C:\>irb --simple-prompt>> a = [:z, :y, :m, :s]=> [:z, :y, :m, :s]>> a.sortNoMethodError: undefined method `<=>' for :z:Symbol        from (irb):2:in `sort'        from (irb):2>>

There was NEED to define `<=>` for the Symbol class. So, I revised the code to sample30-2.rb in the Shoes Tutorial Note.

ashbb
